'''Domains of Blessing''' are [[Domains]] that award [[Artifacts]]. Artifacts will increase the strength of [[character]]s in many ways. Players will have to complete the [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]] before unlocking these. They require {{Item|Original Resin|30|x=20}} to claim.
